headline: Why Flutter Entertainment (FLUT) Shares Are Sliding Today
summary: Shares of global online betting powerhouse Flutter Entertainment (NASDAQ:FLUT) fell 3.9% in the morning session after Wells Fargo downgraded the company's stock from Overweight to Equal-Weight and cut its price target.

headline: Trump may not pick Kevin Hassett to head Fed: 'I would lose you'
summary: As the administration continues to evaluate candidates to become the next chair of the Federal Reserve, President Trump said on Friday that he may want Kevin Hassett — once thought to be a frontrunner — to stay where he is. "I would lose you. It's a serious concern to me," Trump said, as reported by Bloomberg. Kevin Hassett currently serves in the Trump administration as the director of the National Economic Council. Be sure to check out Jennifer Schonberger's profiles on each of the possible candidates to be the next Fed chair: Kevin Hassett, former Fed Governor Kevin Warsh, Fed Governor Chris Waller, Fed Vice Chair of Supervision Michelle Bowman, and BlackRock's (BLK) head of fixed income Rick Rieder. Yahoo Finance interviewed Kevin Hassett in late November 2025. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
